amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Renewable Energy, Energy Reliablity, and Efficiency by $1 million and to reduce funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliablity, and Efficiency account by $1,000,000 and reduce the funds in the Departmental Administration account by $1,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Swalwell (CA) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 213 (Roll no. 318).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Swalwell (CA) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 213 (Roll no. 318).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Swalwell (CA).
